code: import{Chart as ChartJS,ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{Pie}from'react-chartjs-2';import{React}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function StockChart(props){var stockLists=props.stockLists;var dataList=[];var labelList=[];stockLists.map(function(stock){var stockValue=stock.props.amount*stock.props.mark;dataList.push(stockValue);labelList.push(stock.props.name);});ChartJS.register(ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend);var data={labels:labelList,datasets:[{label:'# of Votes',data:dataList,backgroundColor:['rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)','rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)','rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)','rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)','rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)','rgba(255, 159, 64, 0.2)'],borderColor:['rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)','rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)','rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)','rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)','rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)','rgba(255, 159, 64, 1)'],borderWidth:1}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:data,width:400,height:400,options:{maintainAspectRatio:false}});}export default StockChart;
